/* system.admin_auth_mng.getAuthMenuMappingList */ SELECT mnu.menu_url ,mnu.menu_nm ,mnu.menu_note ,CASE WHEN amm.menu_url IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN amm.use_yn = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END use_yn FROM kcgbd.t_menu mnu LEFT JOIN kcgbd.t_auth_menu_mapping amm ON 1=1 AND mnu.menu_url = amm.menu_url AND amm.auth_cd = #{auth_nm} WHERE 1=1 AND mnu.admin_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY mnu.menu_url
